labels.autoConfigureMaxOldSpaceSize: Auto Configure Max Old Space Size

descriptions.theme: The color theme for the UI.
descriptions.hideTips: Hide helpful tips in the UI
descriptions.hideFooter: Hide the footer from the UI
descriptions.showMemoryUsage: Display memory usage information in the UI
descriptions.preferredEditor: The preferred editor to open files in.
descriptions.maxSessionTurns: Maximum number of user/model/tool turns to keep in a session. -1 means unlimited.
descriptions.memoryImportFormat: The format to use when importing memory.
descriptions.memoryDiscoveryMaxDirs: Maximum number of directories to search for memory.
descriptions.contextFileName: The name of the context file.
descriptions.useExternalAuth: Whether to use an external authentication flow.
descriptions.sandbox: Sandbox execution environment (can be a boolean or a path string).
descriptions.excludeTools: Tool names to exclude from discovery.
descriptions.toolDiscoveryCommand: Command to run for tool discovery.
descriptions.toolCallCommand: Command to run for tool calls.
descriptions.bugCommand: Configuration for the bug report command.
descriptions.excludedProjectEnvironmentVariables: Environment variables to exclude from project context.
descriptions.includeDirectories: Additional directories to include in the workspace context.
descriptions.loadMemoryFromIncludeDirectories: Whether to load memory files from include directories.
descriptions.model: The Gemini model to use for conversations.
descriptions.hasSeenIdeIntegrationNudge: Whether the user has seen the IDE integration nudge.
descriptions.folderTrustFeature: Enable folder trust feature for enhanced security.
descriptions.folderTrust: Setting to track whether Folder trust is enabled.
descriptions.showLineNumbers: Show line numbers in the chat.
descriptions.skipNextSpeakerCheck: Disable AI-powered conversation flow analysis. When enabled, conversations will proceed using default behavior instead of intelligent analysis of who should speak next.
descriptions.shouldUseNodePtyShell: Use node-pty for shell command execution. Fallback to child_process still applies.
